content.question: Who should follow the principles of psychological first aid when responding to an adult in distress?

answers.option: All trained responders, first aid providers, and bystanders assisting appropriately.
Only certified medical doctors on the scene.
Only family members of the distressed adult.

content.correct: Correct! Anyone providing psychological first aid should follow its principles, including trained responders and appropriate bystanders.
content.incorrect: Incorrect. The correct answer is: All trained responders, first aid providers, and bystanders assisting appropriately.
